name: Rocket Champions Soccer Car
description:
Do you like soccer? Do you like cars? Then this is your game! Race against other cars and be the first to kick the ball. Blow Up your opponents and be ready to be a champion?

Challenge your friends to see who goes further and gets a better score on the leaderboard! Only the best players will get to the top and you can be one of them!

Go as far as you can to win more cash, be able to upgrade and buy premium cars.

The best car soccer game! With a fire ball! And explosions!

◉ FEATURES ◉

- Incredible 3D Graphics
- Lots of cars to buy and upgrade
- Smooth controls
- Addictive gameplay
- Explosions!

The controls are very simple:

- Tilt your device sideways like a wheel.
- Touch gas button to accelerate
- Touch brake button to slow down
- Kick the ball to beat your opponents

Show your skills and download this game now!!!

Write us a review if you like it!
